attributes.action: Give Fathers more rights to see their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fathers are getting a raw deal with the laws that are in place to see their children if they are seperated or divorced from the mothers. The law is currently too pro mother and this should change. Fathers should have equal rights and see their children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
